data.name: InvalidPasskey
data.value: That passkey is invalid. Please enter the same passkey you used for your other accounts.

data.name: SuccessLink
data.value: Mobile authenticator successfully linked. Please write down your revocation code:

data.name: CheckEmail
data.value: Please check your email, and click the link Steam sent you before continuing.

data.name: FailedAddingPhoneNumber
data.value: Failed to add your phone number. Please try again or use a different phone number.

data.name: AlreadyLinkedAuthenticator
data.value: This account already has an authenticator linked. You must remove that authenticator to add SDA as your authenticator.

data.name: LoginSucceded
data.value: Steam account login succeeded. Press OK to continue adding SDA as your authenticator.

data.name: UnableToSaveMobile
data.value: Unable to save mobile authenticator file. The mobile authenticator has not been linked.

data.name: MobileAuthenticatorNotLinked
data.value: The Mobile Authenticator has not yet been linked. Before finalizing the authenticator, please write down your revocation code:

data.name: InvalidRevocationCode
data.value: Revocation code incorrect; the authenticator has not been linked.

data.name: UnableGenerateCode
data.value: Unable to generate the proper codes to finalize this authenticator. The authenticator should not have been linked. In the off-chance it was, please write down your revocation code, as this is the last chance to see it:

data.name: UnableFinalizeAuthenticator
data.value: Unable to finalize this authenticator. The authenticator should not have been linked. In the off-chance it was, please write down your revocation code, as this is the last chance to see it:

data.name: AnotherInstance
data.value: Another instance of the app is already running.
